name: Meg vs Dakota - Rival Bellies
description:
Hi guys! Here is our game Meg vs Dakota - Rival Bellies (Game or Windows).

I would like to thank everyone who supported and waited for the development and completion of this game. Without the support of the Patrons this would not be possible.

This game is Pong style, where two of my OCs (Who you can see on DeviantArt) are doing an air hockey challenge. Anyone who concedes a goal should drink a energy drink glass. We can expect huge bellies and really loud burping...

This is a fetish game, with bloated bellies and some natural female body functions like burping, hiccups, gurgling... If you don't like this type of content I suggest you don't download the game.

I hope you have fun, guys. And any feedback, bug reports or suggestions are welcome! Feel free to leave a comment (I really enjoy reading the comments ^^)!

Feel free to leave a donation if you want. And you can also support me through Patreon so I can create more content. Or you can just follow here on Itch.io and Deviantart! ^^

>PATREON LINK >DEVIANTART LINK Thanks! Hope you like it!
